thread.title: Jesy Nelson posts FIVE pictures of herself after Perrie Edwards crops her out sparking rift rumours within band
thread.title_full: Jesy Nelson posts FIVE pictures of herself after Perrie Edwards crops her out sparking rift rumours within band

author: Lara Martin
title: Jesy Nelson posts FIVE pictures of herself after Perrie Edwards crops her out sparking rift rumours within band
text:
Celebs Jesy Nelson posts FIVE pictures of herself after Perrie Edwards crops her out sparking rift rumours within band Perrie cropped Jesy out of photos as the singer didn't like them... but then Jesy posted a string of photos herself Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Little Mix fans have been left scratching their heads after Jesy Nelson posted a string of photos from the Kids’ Choice Awards to Instagram AFTER bandmate Perrie Edwards cropped her out of them. 
It all started over the weekend when Perrie shared pictures to social media showing Little Mix at the KCAs in the US - but rather than the usual foursome, the images only showed three Little Mix members: Perrie, Jade Thirlwall and Leigh-Anne Pinnock. 
But before loyal Mixers could get too alarmed, Perrie assured them there’d been no falling out, it was just that Jesy didn’t like the photos of herself Perrie had chosen. This is the photo posted by Perrie (Photo: Splash News) The group as a foursome at the KCAs (Photo: FilmMagic, Inc) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jesy Nelson didn't like her orange carpet look Share this video Watch Next 
Perrie wrote: "Jesy is cropped out the picture because she doesn't like any of the photos!" 
Fair enough, right? 
But then Jesy went on her own Instagram and posted FIVE pictures from the event - including four of her alone, making Little Mix fans very confused as to what exactly was going on. 
Jesy didn't reference Perrie's cropped photo in her own captions. The group performed at the KCAs (Photo: WireImage) The group are known for being close friends (Photo: Getty Images North America) Read More Little Mix's Jesy Nelson and TOWIE's Chris Clark continue to fuel romance rumours with Instagram love hearts 
Fans tried to make sense of it in Instagram comments, with some fearing there had been a falling out and others assuring them that would never happen among the tight knit band. 
One wrote: “I know Perrie said that Jesy is cropped out because she doesn't like the pics but how come she's posted them on her account then? Just a question.” 
Another said: “If Jesy doesn't like the photo, then why the hell she post the same picture of this in her Instagram? And its cropped to. What happen kweens? Tell us!!” Little Mix at The 2017 Kids Choice Awards (Photo: Splash News) 
A third said: “I understand the caption says Jesy doesn't like any of the pictures that's fair enough not everybody likes all there pictures but then why has she been posting them and I'm not being horrible just a genuine question?” 
And a fourth said: "I know the real reason why Jesy is cropped but when I heard rumours that Jesy and Perrie were fighting I nearly cried. But now I know why." 
Other fans, meanwhile, pointed out the photos posted by Perrie and Jesy were different so perhaps it was just the angle or specific photo on Perrie’s account that Jesy wasn’t a fan of. Read More Little Mix wow crowds with Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards performance after they dazzle on orange carpet The girls pictured in November (Photo: Jason Sheldon/REX/Shutterstock) 
One said: “To all of the people causing drama about Jesy. Just trust that the girls have decided together what pictures to post and that there's no beef between them. 
"Jesy may not have like any of the pics that Perrie wanted to post or maybe she found another one that they hadn't seen and posted that afterwards.” 
And another added: “Guys..give it a rest...these girls unlike any other band,love. Each other to death.” 
A third simply said: "Jesy requested to crop it because she doesn't like the picture... there's no bad blood.." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
